wikipedia_page.main: John Thomas Bell (1878–1965) was, together with his two sons, the founder of Bellway, one of the United Kingdom's largest housebuilding businesses.

response: *John Thomas Bell (1878–1965), British businessman, founder of Bellway

The company was founded in 1946 by John Thomas Bell and his sons John and Russell as a housebuilder operating in Newcastle upon Tyne under the name John T. Bell & Sons. In 1951 Kenneth Bell, the youngest of the brothers, joined the business.
**John Thomas Bell (1878–1965), British businessman, founder of Bellway home builders
